title: Can we have an Upgrade to Mandrake Ward: Bard, the wandering Warder.
body: Mandrake Ward now upgrades into bard, an even furtherly roaming ward who occasionally casts skills!

replies.body: Why would we want to downgrade the Mandrake Ward?
yes, that's what he's supposed to do. too bad he sucks at basically everything else.
But Seriously, Bard sh*ts on other supports for his roaming warding in bot lane.
